sentences.en: Bankers say that they have got tougher but they have still tightened lending standards less markedly than their counterparts in the euro area as a whole.
sentences.cn: 银行业主说他们已经紧缩了信用，但是整体上他们对借贷标准的收紧并没有像欧洲其他地区的同行那样明显。

sentences.en: Catalysts that lower markedly the activation energy of the reactions are required.
sentences.cn: 需要显著降低反应活化能的催化剂.

sentences.en: Cellular cleavage and proliferation was markedly inhibited.
sentences.cn: 细胞的分裂、增殖受到明显抑制。

sentences.en: Current economic activity is markedly slower than during the go-go years of the mid to late 1980s.
sentences.cn: 目前的经济发展明显慢于20世纪80年代中期到末期的迅猛增长时期。

sentences.en: Her background is markedly different from her husband's.
sentences.cn: 她的背景和她丈夫的截然不同。

sentences.en: If shoots grow rapidly the root growth rate decreases markedly.
sentences.cn: 如果新梢生长很快,则根系生长显著减慢.

sentences.en: Lawsuits involving property rights and farming and grazing rights increased markedly.
sentences.cn: 涉及财产权,耕作与放牧权的诉讼案件显著地增加.

sentences.en: Sales have slowed down quite markedly.
The emphasis has shifted markedly in recent years.
sentences.cn: 最近几年重点已经明显改变了.

sentences.en: The incidence of various contagious diseases has markedly dropped.
sentences.cn: 各种传染病的发病率大幅度下降.

sentences.en: The morale of the corps had improved markedly since March 1.
sentences.cn: 自三月一日以后,该军之士气日益旺盛.

sentences.en: The nonessential amino acids were markedly reduced.
sentences.cn: 非必须氨基酸明显减少.

sentences.en: The quality of their relationship improved markedly.
sentences.cn: 他们的关系有了显著改善。

sentences.en: The relations between our two countries have improved markedly in every aspect.
sentences.cn: 我们两国的关系在各方面都有了显著的发展.

sentences.en: The two worlds are markedly different.
This year's sales have risen markedly.
sentences.cn: 今年的销售额明显提高了。

sentences.en: When pulmonary capillary pressure is markedly elevated, pulmonary edema ensues.
sentences.cn: 当肺毛细血管压力明显升高时, 就出现肺水肿.

words.tran_cn: 表示（mark的过去分词）；作记号；打分数
注意；作记号于；给…打分数（mark的ing形式）
明显地；显著地；引人注目地
